projects.headline: MY CRAFT
projects.title: Projects
projects.text: In my projects, I focus on creating user-friendly and responsive solutions that are both functional and visually appealing. Each project is built on efficient and clean code to optimize performance and ensure a seamless user experience. Take a look at some of my work and see for yourself the quality and creativity I bring to every project.
projects.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.game: An action-packed jump, run, slash, and throw game with an object-oriented approach
projects.pokedex: An interactive Pokédex web app that fetches Pokémon data via an API, allowing users to search and explore Pokémon details easily.

contactFrom.headline: CONTACT ME
contactFrom.title: Ready to work together?
contactFrom.text: I look forward to hearing from you! If you're looking for a dedicated and passionate frontend developer who can bring real value to your team with expertise and enthusiasm, let's definitely get in touch.
contactFrom.text2: I'm committed to improving my skills and delivering innovative solutions that enhance the user experience. Whether for new projects or existing ones, I'm ready to contribute to your team's success.
contactFrom.subline: Let's work together and create something great! I'm excited to share more about my experience and skills to show how I can contribute to your team.
contactFrom.name: What's your name?
contactFrom.help-input: Hello Alex, I am interested in...
contactFrom.policy: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contactFrom.name-f: Oops! it seems your name is missing
contactFrom.help-f: What do you neet to develop?
